mapper.select: select tbi.id, tbi.content, tbi.like_num, tbi.blog_link_url, tbi.blog_status, tbi.page_view_num, tbi.create_time, tbi.update_time, tbi.title, tbi.t_user_id, tbt.id, tbt.type, tba.id, tba.tag_name, tcc.id, tcc.category_name, tblu.id as tblu_id, tblu.user_id, tf.id as tf_id, tf.favorites_name, tf.description, tf.t_user_id as tf_user_id from t_blog_info tbi left outer join t_blog_info_tag tbit on tbi.id = tbit.t_blog_info_id left outer join t_blog_tag tba on tbit.t_blog_tag_id = tba.id left outer join t_blog_info_type tbi_type on tbi_type.t_blog_info_id = tbi.id left outer join t_blog_type tbt on tbt.id = tbi_type.t_blog_type_id left outer join t_blog_info_category tbic on tbic.t_blog_info_id = tbi.id left outer join t_category_column tcc on tcc.id = tbic.t_category_column_id left outer join t_blog_like_user tblu on tblu.blog_id = tbi.id left outer join t_blog_info_favorites tbif on tbif.blog_id = tbi.id left outer join t_favorites tf on tf.id = tbif.favorites_id where tbi.id = #{blogId} ;
